configuration.electivus.apexLogs.pageSiz: Number of logs to fetch per page (LIMIT).
configuration.electivus.apexLogs.headCon: Maximum number of concurrent requests to fetch log heads.
configuration.electivus.apexLogs.saveDir: Folder under the workspace where Apex logs are saved. If empty, the extension will auto-detect an existing 'apexlog' folder or use 'apexlogs'.
configuration.electivus.apexLogs.tailBuf: Maximum number of lines kept in the Tail view's rolling buffer. Larger values keep more history but use more memory.
configuration.electivus.apexLogs.cliCach: Enable persistent caching for Salesforce CLI calls (org list, etc.).
TTL in seconds for cached results of 'sf org list'. Set 0 to disable persistent cache.
Short-lived in-memory TTL in seconds for cached auth tokens acquired via CLI. Tokens are NOT persisted.
Persistent TTL in seconds for cached results of 'sf org display'. Stores the token locally in VS Code storage to avoid repeated CLI calls across reloads.
tailSaveFailed: Tail: failed to save log to workspace (best-effort).
